item.title: Happy New Year 2023
item.description: I was looking to try something new during the December holidays in 2022. This site is the result. As the first post in the new year, reflecting on the past year is probably a good start. 2022 has gone great for me. I decided to take a break in between jobs in late 2021 and spend some time with my family at home. As a result, I was able to spend the first few months at home with my loved ones.

Employment Software Engineer | Google, Ireland Apr 2022-Present Cloud Web Working on various products and ideas to provide a better experience to the Google Cloud website users. Senior Software Engineer | Grab, Singapore March 2018 - Dec 2021 Geo Designed and developed a real time road incident crowdsourcing system. Promoted to Senior Software Engineer role in April 2020. Designed and implemented a system to fill missing road properties and smoothen existing data over continuous road segments.
